name: iPhone 15 Pro
description: Latest iPhone with A17 Pro chip, 256GB storage, Pro camera system with 48MP main camera, Action Button, and titanium design. Features 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: Premium Android smartphone with Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, 256GB storage, 200MP camera, S Pen support, and 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display. Built with titanium frame.

name: MacBook Pro 14-inch
description: Apple MacBook Pro with M3 chip, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, 14.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display. Perfect for professionals and creative work.

name: Dell XPS 15
description: Premium laptop with Intel Core i7, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, NVIDIA RTX 4050, 15.6-inch OLED display. Ideal for content creation and gaming.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise canceling wireless headphones with 30-hour battery life, quick charge, and premium sound quality. Perfect for travel and work.

name: AirPods Pro (2nd Gen)
description: Apple AirPods Pro with Active Noise Cancellation, Spatial Audio, Adaptive EQ, and MagSafe charging case. Up to 6 hours of listening time.

name: iPad Air
description: Apple iPad Air with M2 chip, 256GB storage, 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, Touch ID, and support for Apple Pencil. Available in multiple colors.

name: Nintendo Switch OLED
description: Nintendo Switch with 7-inch OLED screen, 64GB internal storage, enhanced audio, and wide adjustable stand. Includes Joy-Con controllers.

name: PlayStation 5
description: Sony PlayStation 5 console with 825GB SSD, DualSense wireless controller, 4K gaming support, and ray tracing capabilities.

name: Xbox Series X
description: Microsoft Xbox Series X with 1TB SSD, 4K gaming at 60fps, backward compatibility, and Xbox Game Pass support.

name: Nike Air Max 90
description: Classic Nike Air Max 90 sneakers with visible Air cushioning, durable rubber outsole, and iconic design. Available in multiple colorways.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 23
description: Premium running shoes with Boost midsole technology, Primeknit upper, and Continental rubber outsole. Designed for maximum comfort and performance.

name: Levi's 501 Original Jeans
description: Classic straight-fit jeans with button fly, 100% cotton denim, and timeless design. Available in multiple washes and sizes.

name: Patagonia Better Sweater
description: Fleece jacket made from recycled polyester, full-zip design, and classic fit. Perfect for outdoor activities and casual wear.

name: The North Face Nuptse Jacket
description: Iconic puffer jacket with 700-fill goose down, water-resistant shell, and adjustable hood. Available in multiple colors.

name: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
description: Bestselling novel by Taylor Jenkins Reid. A captivating story about a reclusive Hollywood icon and the journalist she chooses to tell her story.

name: Atomic Habits
description: Self-help book by James Clear about building good habits and breaking bad ones. Practical strategies for making small changes that lead to remarkable results.

name: The Midnight Library
description: Novel by Matt Haig about a library between life and death where you can try out different versions of your life. A thought-provoking and inspiring read.

name: Project Hail Mary
description: Science fiction novel by Andy Weir. A lone astronaut must save the Earth from disaster. Full of humor, science, and adventure.

name: Dune
description: Epic science fiction novel by Frank Herbert. Set on the desert planet Arrakis, it's a complex tale of politics, religion, and ecology.

name: Dyson V15 Detect Vacuum
description: Cordless vacuum cleaner with laser technology to reveal microscopic dust, HEPA filtration, and 60 minutes of runtime. Lightweight and powerful.

name: Instant Pot Duo 7-in-1
description: Electric pressure cooker that works as a pressure cooker, slow cooker, rice cooker, steamer, saut√© pan, yogurt maker, and warmer. 6-quart capacity.

name: Roomba j7+ Robot Vacuum
description: Self-emptying robot vacuum with intelligent navigation, obstacle avoidance, and automatic dirt disposal. Works with Alexa and Google Assistant.

name: Nespresso Vertuo Coffee Maker
description: Single-serve coffee maker with Centrifusion technology, makes espresso and coffee, includes milk frother. Compatible with Vertuo capsules.

name: Philips Hue Starter Kit
description: Smart lighting kit with 3 color bulbs, bridge, and app control. Works with Alexa, Google Assistant, and Apple HomeKit. Create custom scenes and schedules.

name: Peloton Bike
description: Interactive exercise bike with 22-inch HD touchscreen, live and on-demand classes, and adjustable resistance. Includes 30-day home trial.

name: Yoga Mat Premium
description: Extra-thick non-slip yoga mat with carrying strap. Made from eco-friendly TPE material, 6mm thickness for comfort and support.

name: Garmin Forerunner 955
description: Advanced GPS running watch with heart rate monitoring, training metrics, music storage, and up to 20 days battery life. Perfect for serious runners.

name: Hydro Flask Water Bottle
description: Insulated stainless steel water bottle keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. 32oz capacity, leak-proof lid, and multiple color options.

name: Adjustable Dumbbells Set
description: Space-saving adjustable dumbbells from 5-50lbs each. Quick-change weight system, durable construction, and compact design for home gyms.

name: Canon EOS R6 Mark II
description: Full-frame mirrorless camera with 24.2MP sensor, 4K video recording, in-body image stabilization, and advanced autofocus system.

name: Sony A7 IV
description: Professional mirrorless camera with 33MP full-frame sensor, 4K video, real-time eye autofocus, and 5-axis image stabilization.

name: Kindle Paperwhite
description: Waterproof e-reader with 6.8-inch glare-free display, adjustable warm light, and weeks of battery life. 8GB storage for thousands of books.

name: Apple Watch Series 9
description: Latest Apple Watch with S9 chip, Always-On Retina display, advanced health features, and up to 18 hours battery life. GPS and cellular options.

name: Fitbit Charge 6
description: Advanced fitness tracker with heart rate monitoring, built-in GPS, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery life. Works with Google services.
